creator: Appsfestive
descriptionHtml:
उत्तर प्रदेश सामान्य ज्ञान ,क्विज और जी०के० प्रतियोगता परीक्षा के लिए महत्वपूर्ण |

This app "UP GK App in Hindi" has Multiple Choice Objective Questions and simple questions and Quiz Section for UP Examinations and all other government jobs.

Questions have been in sets. Each set has more than 20+ questions with their respective answers.

For Study Purposes these GK questions are helpful to crack the exams who are preparing for Up Government jobs GK.

In this app we have described GK and the important section of GK :-

Introduction
Tourist places of Up
Population Of Up
Established year of UP
Up at a glance
Geography
Lakes and rivers
Major university
Tribe
Production - Industry
Modern history
Energy resources
Chief Minister - list of governors
Cabinet Ministers
Tourist destination in UP
Top Famous Temples of UP
Districts
Ancient history of UP
Former Vedic period
Buddha period
Culture heritage
Mauryan period
GK of Upcoming exam
Current Affairs Gk
Rivers and tourism of up
Previously asked question of UP Exam
Quiz for up exam
Rivers
Cm's or Governor

This application is very useful for each and every competitive exam such TAG- Latest UP Government Jobs, UP Sarkari JOBS , UP JOB NEWS , UPTET , ,UPPSC Civil Judge,
UPSSSC Mandi Inspector, Stenographer,UPBEB Assistant Teacher Exam,UPSC CDS
, Field Worker, DEO, ,UP Block Account Manager, Nutritionist, Psychologist, MO & Other,UPPSC RO/AO Samiksha Adhikari ,UPSC EPFO ,UPPSC Assistant Engineer exam, UPSSSC Junior Asst , Research Asst, Research Associate, Computer Personnel.

Disclosure :-

1. Permission used in this application -` Internet permission only`.This application
contains ads from third party.
2. For more details we request you to please read our privacy policy .
3. We hope you like our "Apps" .For any suggestion or query please contact on our mail id .
descriptionShort: UP GK Notes , UP Quiz , MCQs ,Practice Set GK for UPPSC and UP Govt Exam .

This app is built to provide knowledge/general information to the user. In this app all type of information and images are collected from different sources(Books, Magazines or Internet).
